name: Birds vs Frogs
description:
When a community of birds swears to protect a giant egg, a separate community of troublesome frogs swears to capture the egg and eat it.

Birds vs Frogs is a unique tower defense-style video game inspired by Plants vs Zombies and Angry Birds. With only one bird on screen at a time, use countless strategies to take out the pesky frogs who plan to invade and steal the giant egg!

Walk through, or fly through, a three-part campaign and defeat the vexing frogs! Or you can explore other game modes like Endless and put your skills to the test! You can also try out the multitude of bonus levels that mix up the game and put an extra spin or two on the main formula!
